name: Autumn's Remembrance
description: Autumn is here and the leaves are falling.  Help the crow find all of the leaves to help build the nest.  Beware of the scarecrows who want nothing more than to thwart the crow's attempts to collect enough leaves.  Temporarily incapacitate the scarecrows and turn them into spiders by collecting the pumpkins scattered throughout the mazes.   There are 5 mazes and they increase steadily in difficulty.  Can you complete them all and become a legend?
